inspectorate_to_the_supreme_judicial_cou: Inspectorate to the Supreme Judicial Council
verification_financial_interests_disclos: Verification of Financial Interests Disclosure Declarations
enter_judiciary_authority: Please enter the name of the judicial authority in which you hold the position of judge, prosecutor or investigator
enter_position: Please select from the drop-down menu the position held, the reason for submitting the declaration
choose_from_drop_down: Please select from the drop-down menu
choose_from_drop_down_or_type: Please select from the drop-down menu or fill with text
declaration_not_published_title: List of judges, prosecutors and investigators who failed to submit declarations within the time limit under Article 175a, Paragraph 1, Item 1, cf. Article 175c, Paragraph 1, Item 1 of the Civil Code
declaration_decrees: List of criminal decrees entered into force under Art. 175d, Para. 1, Item 2 of the Civil Code
declaration_discrepancies: List of judges, prosecutors and investigators for whom a discrepancy was found in the declarations
declaration_propertyType_tooltip: The properties are described in the following sequence: apartment, house, house with a yard, villa, villa with a cottage, garage, office, shop, storage and production premises, plot. Limited rights in rem include the right to build, build and add, and the right to use in rem.
declaration_location_tooltip: The location of the property is indicated - city, region, village, summer resort, resort, without indicating the specific address. When the property is located abroad, only the place of residence is indicated.
declaration_municipality_tooltip: The municipality in which the property is declared is indicated, and when the property is abroad, the country in which it is located is indicated.
declaration_area_tooltip: The area is indicated in square meters.
declaration_builtUpAreaSqM_tooltip: The built-up area of the property is filled in, and when the building has more than one floor - the expanded built-up area.
declaration_yearOfAcquisition_tooltip: Fill in the year of acquisition of the relevant property.
declaration_owner_tooltip: Enter the name of the owner of the property (declarant, his spouse or person with whom he is in de facto cohabitation on a conjugal basis and minor children), and when owned jointly with the spouse or the person with whom he is in de facto cohabitation of marital beginnings and a minor child, the co-owned part is described on a separate line of the table, with the name of the co-owner indicated in column 9, and the corresponding ideal part indicated in column 10.
declaration_owner2_page4_tooltip: When the vehicle is in the name of the spouse or the person with whom the declarant is de facto cohabiting on a conjugal basis or the minor children, this is reflected in this column.
declaration_legalBasisForAcquisition_too: The column is filled in only when the declared property was acquired during the occupation of the position of judge, prosecutor or investigator. Indicate the legal basis for acquisition / purchase and sale, exchange, donation, contract for transfer against duty of care and maintenance, bequest, inheritance, statute of limitations, compensation, etc./ When the legal basis is gratuitous, in the next column 'Origin of funds' 'free' or 'none' is indicated or the legal basis is repeated.
declaration_legalBasisForAcquisition_pag: The column is filled in only when the declared property was acquired during the occupation of the position of judge, prosecutor or investigator. When the legal basis is gratuitous, the column 'Origin of funds' indicates 'gratuitous' or 'none'.
declaration_originOfFunds_tooltip: The column is filled in only when the declared property was acquired during the occupation of the position of judge, prosecutor or investigator. The origin of the funds/savings, loans, wages, donation, inheritance and other income is indicated, according to the types indicated in Table 18. When the origin of funds is from income according to Table 18, the declarant can add income according to the relevant lines of Table 18.
declaration_originOfFunds_page4_tooltip: The column is filled in only when the declared property was acquired during the occupation of the position of judge, prosecutor or investigator. The origin of the funds/savings, loans, wages, donation, inheritance and other income is indicated, according to the types indicated in Table 18. When the origin of funds is from income according to Table 18, the declarant can add income according to the relevant lines of Table 18.
declaration_legalBasisForExpropriation_t: The type of transaction (sale, exchange, donation, etc.) is indicated.
